items.name: Integrate Microsoft 365 usage reporting into your organization's existing reporting solution
items.description: Use the reports API to incorporate Microsoft 365 usage data into your organization's existing reporting solution so that all IT service reports are in a unified location.

items.name: Retain usage reports for historical analysis
items.description: Use the reports API to get the data that's available in all usage reports, including organization-level summaries per service, entity-level (user, sites, accounts) usage information for the last 7/30/90/180 days, and daily activity aggregates.

items.name: Analyze AD FS application activity and configuration
items.description: Get information about a relying party configured with Active Directory Federation Services (AD FS), its aggregated usage, and whether the relying party configuration can be migrated to Azure Active Directory.

items.name: Monitor application sign-ins
items.description: Monitor the usage of your applications and make decisions about usage patterns.

items.name: Determine who is using your applications and how are they using them
items.description: Understand how users in your organization use Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) capabilities, such as self-service password rest and multi-factor authentication (MFA).

items.name: Monitor activity on an Azure AD tenant
items.description: Gain a better understanding of how your users access and use Azure AD services. You can analyze the data to create custom solutions tailored to your organization's specific needs.
